Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பகச்சொல்லிக் கேளிர்ப் பிரிப்பர் நகச்சொல்லிநட்பாடல் தேற்றா தவர்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Those who know not to live in friendship with amusing conversation will by back-biting estrange even their relatives.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown who is incapable of pleasant, friendly conversation. They cannot speak joyful words ('நகச் சொல்லி நட்பாடல் தேற்றாதவர்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Because they lack this positive social skill, they resort to a negative one. They are shown whispering divisive, hateful words ('பகச் சொல்லி') to a group of close-knit friends or family members ('கேளிர்').
Layered_Composition.Background: The hateful words are visualized as magical, corrosive acid that instantly dissolves the bonds of friendship and kinship between the listeners, forcing them apart ('பிரிப்பர்'). The person's inability to create joy leads them to destroy it instead.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Those who do not have the skill to maintain friendships with pleasant conversation will inevitably resort to divisive speech that breaks even the closest of relationships.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The divisive words as corrosive acid dissolving the bonds is a powerful metaphor. The person is not necessarily evil, but their social incompetence leads them to destructive behavior. The inability to create is replaced by the impulse to destroy.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A socially awkward, grey-toned scene. The divisive words are a sickly, corrosive green acid that eats away at the warm, golden bonds of friendship.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that focuses on the whispering person, with the immediate, destructive effect of their words on the group of friends shown clearly.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with advanced visual effects for the dissolving bonds.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The scene's warm light of friendship is extinguished by the corrosive effect of the divisive words.

Cultural_Anchors: Those who do not know how to befriend with joyful words (நகச் சொல்லி நட்பாடல் தேற்றாதவர்)
